column4: I've just installed a LAMP stack through sudo apt-get. I installed the apache2 package, but my httpd.conf is empty? why is this and how do I fix?
how do I delete a file that gives me a "permission denied" error when trying to delete via file browser? (I'm on the only account on the OS)
You'll want to use sudo to edit the file, gksu gedit /path/to/file
